title: game crashes after champion select
body:
When I try to start a game after I'm done with champion select the loading screen appears for about 5 seconds then the game crashes giving me the bug splat error message.
Please,help I got punished by leaver buster because of it![ 
here is a screen shot of the messege](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CwXsGCSXUAMlca3.jpg:large)

replies.body: This bugsplat error is usually caused by a driver or game file failing to render the game correctly, and causing it to crash like this.  Go over the instructions in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to get this fixed up.  It's important to go over every step to make sure your drivers and settings are setup to play.  Let me know if you have any questions!
